biotools.summary: Database of data from the newt Notophthalmus viridescens. Newt-Omics aims to provide a comprehensive platform of expressed genes during tissue regeneration, including extensive annotations, expression data and experimentally verified peptide sequences with yet no homology to other publically available gene sequences.

bioschemas.name: Newt-omics
